mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_TEL, USER_ADDRESS, USER_IMG, USER_ROLE, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM "월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS ENROLL_DT FROM "users" LEFT JOIN "shop" USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_STATUS = 'A' AND USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "users" VALUES(SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userNickname}, #{userTel}, #{userAddress}, NULL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
